EmailTemplate.name: Nurture - WhiteSpace-PricingPlan.Reminder-1
EmailTemplate.subject: Get a better pricing plan today
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
I know you must be busy running the office. In my previous email, I mentioned 2 new free pricing plans that would be better suited for you than your current outdated plan. Just a quick reminder that making the switch to one of these plans will give you the best prices on paper, toner and technology. I know that either one of these plans are better than your current plan because in addition to improved pricing you would also receive stronger offers on national brand products or Grand & Toy private label products. I will also be personally assigned to you as your dedicated point of contact. When you make the switch, you will be provided with a 10% off coupon that you can use on your first purchase until December 20, 2019. Need a closer look at these new free pricing plans? You can check them out here <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/Nurture---WhiteSpace-PricingPlan_WhiteSpace-PricingPlan-Master.html]]>. If you have any questions or don’t feel as though these 2 plans satisfy your needs, feel free to contact me.
Sincerely, Sean Beauchemin Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Road, Ottawa, ON K1G 0Z7 E-mail: seanbeauchemin@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:seanbeauchemin@grandandtoy.com]]> | Tel: 1-800-348-2184 Ext: 44170 Fax: 1-613-244-0765 Toll Free/Sans Frais Fax: 1-866-391-8555 Office Supplies | Cleaning & Breakroom | Interiors & Furniture | Technology | Print & Documents grandandtoy.com <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/]]> CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The content of this e-mail (and attachments, if any) is privileged and confidential, and intended solely for its designated recipient(s). Any dissemination, distribution or copying of this e-mail, other than by its intended recipient(s), is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail by error, please delete it and notify us immediately by reply e-mail.
